Posts.Content: Aug 3, 2007 08:50PM angelawooten wrote: I was told one year ago I had breast cancer stage four in left breast. I received six chemo treatments before having the breast removed.Also had a port placed under my skin.Which I highly recommend everyone to have.I went through more chemo and then radiation.today i am in remission.I wont say it was an easy road.But if I can get through it with no family support anyone can. Remember others has been where you are and you are not alone. Hold your head up high and take one day at a time
Posts.Title: Robin Roberts on GMA is in our club whoopsiedoodles whoopsiedoodles
